702201f-a.text:
Willow Lane, north side, east of Westchester Ave., directly at the point where it makes a ninety degree angle in a southerly direction (lot 48), showing the S. Paul House. Another frame house, on the adjoining Paul estate, was located at the S. W. corner of Hobert and Wilkinson Avenues. The house, here shown, is still standing according to Bromley's map of 1927.
1910
Gift of Randall Comfort
702201f-a.folder: Willow Lane & Westchester Avenue, Bronx, NY
